verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All that I have I know that You gave me You’re faithful and true to meet all my needs You lift up my head, give drink when I’m thirsty From rivers that flow from eternity.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}So I give from what You have given I give back to You from Your own hand And I sing of Your bountiful goodness Your wondrous deeds throughout all the land.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The work that You start You’re sure to accomplish You finish the work You’ve begun in me You’ve raised up Your Son In a world full of darkness To shine in my heart So that I can see.{/lang-eng}
